title: Connection issues
body:
sorry if this isnt the right place to be posting this.
Before i moved i was getting this terrible *lag* My game would be at 60 Frames/60ping which was normal.
For example of what would happen is i would charge my E as Zac. Fly in and my game would freeze i would teleport from where i started it and i would die where i had it indicated to go, I wouldn't get to see what happened at all.
Anyway during one of my ranked games today my internet completely died out for about 10 minutes i reset the modem and after a few minutes it picked up again.
I rejoined my game (thankfully team didn't give up and we ended up winnning) but now the same thing is happening again and i am unsure how to fix it.
Does anyone have this problem or a solution to it?
Thanks in advanced!.. Sorry if this is posted in the wrong place. New to forums

replies.body:
If by "internet completely died" you mean your Modem/Router lost network connection, then this is likely an issue with the equipment. In this case, I'd recommend reaching out to your ISP so they can assist you with testing the hardware and replacing it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
